item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0498; 07:41AM; 149 S St Andrews Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3XhDPGD; Koreatown; KNOCKDOWN: The first arriving 22 firefighters (an additional task force had been requested) extinguished the fire in 12 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was contained to the unit of origin. The elderly female occupant of the unit is being evaluated for any medical complaints. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 E229 E261 E29 E52 E6 E61 RA6 RA61 T29 T61; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0498; 07:29AM; 155 S St Andrews Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Xi3fUG; Koreatown; Two story, garden style apartment building with fire showing from one unit on the first floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. The occupant of the unit is confirmed to be out. ; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 E229 E29 E52 E6 RA6 T29; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update Debris Flow; INC#2101; 01:39AM; 3789 N Fredonia Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ioYwSj; Studio City; Firefighters made contact at seven homes on Fredonia which are along the debris flow and there is no damage to any of the homes. There are a total of 17 people sheltering in place in the homes. There are two homes on Wrightwood Lane (just north/west of Bellfield Way) which are affected by the debris flow. The flow went into the backyard of one home with about 1 ft of mud against the back sliding door but it is static and expected to hold. The 2nd home does not have any damage but has debris on side. There are a total of 8 occupants in the homes sheltering in place. Firefighters are continuing to evaluate and assess any other homes believed to be of concern. The water is draining and not increasing. There are no injuries reported. Drivers should avoid Wrightwood Ln to Fredonia Dr down to Lankershim / Cahuenga as this will be an extended duration operation for Street Services to clear the roads. No further details and no further updates anticipated unless the situation changes.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 CM40 CM42 E227 E278 E289 E76 E86 E89 EM14 HE2 RA76 RA827 RA86 T27 T78 T89 UA6 UR27 UR88 UR89; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update Debris Flow ; INC#2101; 12:43AM; 3789 N Fredonia Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ioYwSj; Studio City; There is a debris flow moving down Fredonia Dr towards Kentucky Dr. There is 3-4 feet of debris and mud covering the road. Crews are both north and south of the area working to gain access/situational awareness and evaluate all affected (5) homes. Currently, none of the homes firefighters have accessed (all homes on the South side) have any flooding or damage to their homes but they are not able to evacuate due to the condition of the road. It is safer for them to shelter in place at this time. There are two homes on the North side of the street which firefighters have not been able to access. Firefighters will continue working to reach each of the homes. Street maintenance notified and responding. The water is starting to recede, estimated to be down about 1 ft from the level at the start of the incident. There are no injuries reported nor any damage to homes. No further details.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E227 E278 E76 E86 T27 T78 UR27 UR88; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Flooding (Mud); INC#2101; 11:36PM; 3789 N Fredonia Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ioYwSj; Studio City; Approximately 3 to 4 feet of mud (in some places 5 feet) covering Fredonia and moving down hill towards Kentucky Dr. An additional task force added to evaluated the homes and determine if any structures are threatened and what actions, if any, are required by LAFD. Fredonia Dr is completely closed at the incident address and drivers are advised to avoid Fredonia from Wrightwood down to where it turns into Kentucky Dr (to Lankershim). No further details at this time.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E278 E76 E86 T78; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Trapped Vehicle; INC#2037; 11:47PM; 12240 N Balboa Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3XiGHmF; Granada Hills; The 49 yo male was extricated and will be transported in *at least* serious condition. Any questions regarding the collision are referred to LAPD Inc# 3797. No further details.; FS 18; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E18 E287 E75 E87 EM15 HR3 RA70 RA75 T87 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Trapped Vehicle; INC#2037; 11:13PM; 12240 N Balboa Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3XiGHmF; Granada Hills; Two car collision with one patient trapped, 49 yo male in *at least* serious condition. This will be an extended extrication operation due to the amount of damage to the vehicle. The driver (adult male) of the 2nd vehicle declined LAFD treatment / transport. ; FS 18; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E18 E287 E75 E87 EM15 HR3 RA70 RA75 T87 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Debris Flow, Small (Road Closure); INC#1981; 11:27PM; 1110 N Beverly Glen Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IBJF1j; Bel-Air; Mud has crossed over and completely covered Beverly Glen Bl just north of the reporting address. The road is a full closure and drivers are advised to seek alternate routes. No buildings damaged and on injuries reported. No further details.; FS 71; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 5; E71; CH7; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1854; 09:55PM; 1129 W 43rd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3CB3j9W; Vermont Square; KNOCKDOWN: 20 firefighters extinguished the fire in 23 minutes with no injuries reported. No further details.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E15 E215 E46 RA15 RA246 T15; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1867; 09:53PM; 2927 N Minto Ct; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vSmWqe; El Sereno; KNOCKDOWN: 24 firefighters extinguished the fire in 16 minutes with no injuries reported. One occupant was rescued out of the small structure by firefighters and sustained no injuries. No other structures were damaged. No further details.; FS 47; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC2 E12 E16 E201 E203 E212 E47 RA12 RA47 T1 T12 T3; CH7; 15; Margaret Stewart
